title: GTMVP - MVP Development & Launch Services
content:
# GTMVP - MVP Development Services

## Service Overview
Complete MVP development and launch service from concept to market-ready product within 90 days, including user testing, feedback integration, and go-to-market strategy.

## Key Metrics
- 90 Days to Launch
- 85% Success Rate
- 50% Cost Savings (vs. traditional development)
- 24/7 Development Support
- 50+ Successful MVP Launches

## The Problem We Solve
- 90% of startups fail due to building products without market validation
- 18 months typical development timeline (too slow)
- $250K average wasted investment on failed products
- 42% fail due to no market need

## 4-Phase 90-Day Development Process

### Phase 1: Discovery & Planning (Weeks 1-2)
Requirements gathering, user stories, technical architecture

### Phase 2: Design & Prototyping (Weeks 3-4)
UI/UX designs and interactive prototypes

### Phase 3: Development & Testing (Weeks 5-10)
MVP build with continuous user feedback

### Phase 4: Launch & Optimize (Weeks 11-12)
Deployment and go-to-market execution

## Complete Package Deliverables
- Full MVP development (web or mobile)
- UI/UX design and implementation
- Real user testing with target customers
- Go-to-market strategy and launch plan
- Performance analytics and tracking setup
- 3 months post-launch support
- Technical documentation and handover
- Scaling roadmap for future development

## Pricing
**Fixed Price: $2,500** for complete MVP package
- 50% less than traditional development costs
- Payment plans available
- 90-day delivery guarantee included

## Case Study
TaskFlow by Altman: Launched in 75 days, achieved $50K MRR in 6 months

## Contact Information
- Phone: (954) 228-5908
- Email: hello@gtmvp.com
- Location: Dover, Delaware
